label: üé≤ Random Prompts
sql:
SELECT 
    act,
    prompt
FROM 
    train
ORDER BY 
    RANDOM()
LIMIT 10;

label: ‚úçÔ∏è Writing & Storytelling
sql:
SELECT 
    act,
    prompt
FROM 
    train
WHERE 
    LOWER(act) LIKE '%writer%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%story%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%poet%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%novelist%'
LIMIT 20;

label: ‚úàÔ∏è Travel & Adventure
sql:
SELECT 
    act,
    prompt
FROM 
    train
WHERE 
    LOWER(prompt) LIKE '%travel%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%travel%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%guide%'
LIMIT 20;

label: üç≥ Food & Cooking
sql:
SELECT 
    act,
    prompt
FROM 
    train
WHERE 
    LOWER(act) LIKE '%chef%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%cook%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%food%'
    OR LOWER(prompt) LIKE '%recipe%'
LIMIT 20;

label: üí™ Health & Fitness
sql:
SELECT 
    act,
    prompt
FROM 
    train
WHERE 
    LOWER(act) LIKE '%fitness%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%trainer%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%health%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%diet%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%coach%'
LIMIT 20;

label: üé≠ Entertainment & Fun
sql:
SELECT 
    act,
    prompt
FROM 
    train
WHERE 
    LOWER(act) LIKE '%comedian%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%magician%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%movie%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%game%'
LIMIT 20;

label: üìö Education & Learning
sql:
SELECT 
    act,
    prompt
FROM 
    train
WHERE 
    LOWER(act) LIKE '%teacher%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%tutor%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%instructor%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%professor%'
LIMIT 20;

label: üíº Career & Business
sql:
SELECT 
    act,
    prompt
FROM 
    train
WHERE 
    LOWER(act) LIKE '%interview%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%recruiter%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%business%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%entrepreneur%'
LIMIT 20;

label: üé® Art & Creativity
sql:
SELECT 
    act,
    prompt
FROM 
    train
WHERE 
    LOWER(act) LIKE '%artist%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%designer%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%creative%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%composer%'
LIMIT 20;

label: üó£Ô∏è Language Learning
sql:
SELECT 
    act,
    prompt
FROM 
    train
WHERE 
    LOWER(act) LIKE '%english%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%translator%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%pronunciation%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%language%'
LIMIT 20;

label: üßò Mental Wellness
sql:
SELECT 
    act,
    prompt
FROM 
    train
WHERE 
    LOWER(act) LIKE '%motivat%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%therapist%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%coach%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%counselor%'
LIMIT 20;

label: üé¨ Role-Play Characters
sql:
SELECT 
    act,
    prompt
FROM 
    train
WHERE 
    LOWER(prompt) LIKE '%act as%'
    OR LOWER(prompt) LIKE '%act like%'
    OR LOWER(prompt) LIKE '%character%'
LIMIT 25;

label: üí° Quick & Simple Prompts
sql:
SELECT 
    act,
    prompt
FROM 
    train
ORDER BY 
    LENGTH(prompt) ASC
LIMIT 15;

label: üìä Dataset Overview
sql:
SELECT 
    COUNT(*) AS total_prompts,
    COUNT(DISTINCT contributor) AS contributors
FROM 
    train;

label: üîç Search by Keyword
sql:
-- Change 'music' to any topic you want
SELECT 
    act,
    prompt
FROM 
    train
WHERE 
    LOWER(prompt) LIKE '%music%'
    OR LOWER(act) LIKE '%music%'
LIMIT 20;

label: üë®‚Äçüíª Tech & Developer
sql:
SELECT 
    act,
    prompt
FROM 
    train
WHERE 
    for_devs = 'TRUE'
LIMIT 30;

label: üë• Everyday Life
sql:
SELECT 
    act,
    prompt
FROM 
    train
WHERE 
    for_devs = 'FALSE'
ORDER BY 
    RANDOM()
LIMIT 25;

label: üèÜ Top Contributors
sql:
SELECT 
    contributor,
    COUNT(*) AS prompts
FROM 
    train
WHERE 
    contributor IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 
    contributor
ORDER BY 
    prompts DESC
LIMIT 10;

label: üìù Detailed Prompts
sql:
SELECT 
    act,
    prompt
FROM 
    train
ORDER BY 
    LENGTH(prompt) DESC
LIMIT 10;

label: üéØ All Prompts
sql:
SELECT 
    act,
    prompt,
    type
FROM 
    train
LIMIT 100;
